0: The lobby is clean and inviting and they provide complimentary tea and cold lemonade
I want to single out the efforts of Gisela at the front desk who spearheaded the search efforts and was very helpful
I stayed here for business for 2 nights in a standard room
Rooftop restaurant staff was warm and friendly
Service in the hotel was good
After two stays this is now my hotel of choice in LAHighly recommended
I was so relieved when I arrived at the Kimpton Wilshire to find a delightful hotel so close to everything you want to see in LA
1: We ’ve had a few negative experiences with the staff
Shower gel shampoo and conditioner were in large bottles not like those little squeeze bottles you usually get
I suggest the hotel needs to work on their staffing and the management team needs to keep on top of things if they want to match the atmosphere of the hotel
Room missing hand soap had to call for that
Bathroom faucet not extended far enough into sink basin leading to water collection where toiletries stored
Anyone who has ever stayed in a hotel in a city should be familiar with the sound
The burger I ordered was raw and everything was cold
The customer service was non existent after check in apart from Conor finding us a kettle on the third time of asking and my refusing to leave reception until the item had been provided
They had ice bags on the 5th floor and coffee on the 2nd floor too which was good

The only reason I am rating a 3 is because they have been changing administration of the restaurant since January and everytime we were there the happy hour or something was different without any notice last time they stopped serving alcohol changing administration rather than that the staff was completely friendly the view is amazing it was a nice place to enjoy a cocktail during sunset
